text: Luther Thomas Ingram (November 30, 1937 â€“ March 19, 2007) was an American R&B; singer-songwriter. He had many hit songs during his career. His song (If Loving You is Wrong) I Don't Want to be Right was released in 1972. He died from heart failure.
